ch0273_00_savory/0101_0701_01_10:
Exactly when we agreed to meet. Quite the
commendable punctuality.
ch0273_00_savory/0101_0701_02_10:
Well then, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Let’s have
an elegant day today, shall we?
ch0273_00_savory/7101_0701_01_10: Are you curious about my psychic powers?
ch0273_00_savory/7101_0701_02_10:
I’ve got nothing up my sleeves—my powers defy
human comprehension!
ch0273_00_savory/7101_0701_03_10: I can even make you levitate if you so desire!
ch0273_00_savory/7102_0701_01_10:
It has always been my dream to become a
Psychic-type Gym Leader.
ch0273_00_savory/7102_0701_02_10:
And I finally achieved it as a result of my elegant
hard work!
ch0273_00_savory/7102_0701_03_10:
Well, our Gym is still in the minor division...but
we’ll make it to the major division in due time!
ch0273_00_savory/7103_0701_01_10: If you ever visit the Isle of Armor in Galar...
ch0273_00_savory/7103_0701_02_10:
you must tour the Master Dojo, where the famous
Champion Leon trained.
ch0273_00_savory/7103_0701_03_10:
However, if you’re hoping to be admitted at your
current skill level, I don’t think you’re quite up
to snuff.
ch0273_00_savory/7103_0701_04_10:
Therefore! I suggest you head home as soon as
you’re done seeing the sights!
ch0273_00_savory/7104_0701_01_10: Many people on Pasio wear rather elegant attire...
ch0273_00_savory/7104_0701_02_10: Could they perhaps have Style Cards?
ch0273_00_savory/7105_0701_01_10: I have a great deal of respect for Slowpoke.
ch0273_00_savory/7105_0701_02_10:
They don’t care what others think of them. I think
there’s a certain elegance to that.
ch0273_00_savory/7105_0701_03_10:
You shouldn’t pay much mind to what others think
of you either, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0273_00_savory/1701_0701_01_10: Um... Please take this, if you’d like.
ch0273_00_savory/1701_0702_01_10: You’ll certainly become more elegant if you use it.
ch0273_00_savory/2501_0701_01_10:
There seem to be quite a few people on Pasio
who can use psychic powers.
ch0273_00_savory/2501_0701_02_10:
Some of whom are younger and more talented
than I am...
ch0273_00_savory/2501_0701_04_10:
If I can’t beat them in the realm of psychic ability,
then I must simply beat them in Pokémon battles!
ch0273_00_savory/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ll do things at my own pace just like Slowpoke
and keep improving my own strengths!
ch0273_00_savory/2501_0702_02_10:
For that reason! I’ll have you assist me in
my training!
ch0273_00_savory/2501_0702_03_10: Isn’t that just what you like to hear?
ch0273_00_savory/2511_0701_01_10:
I learned something important during my time at
the Master Dojo.
ch0273_00_savory/2511_0701_02_10:
In order to defeat others, I need to first be able to
defeat myself.
ch0273_00_savory/2511_0701_03_10: Learning this firsthand is what led to my growth.
ch0273_00_savory/2511_0702_01_10:
You shouldn’t turn to the shadows like a Dark type
just because you can’t win against someone.
ch0273_00_savory/2511_0702_02_10:
Even though it’s not very elegant, it’s wise to
train diligently.
ch0273_00_savory/3001_0701_01_10:
What an elegant morning! It’s time to awaken the
potential sleeping within you!
ch0273_00_savory/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s far too early in the day to start taking it easy.
You must keep moving—with elegance!
ch0273_00_savory/3005_0701_01_10:
I have used too much of my power today. I think
I shall take it easy now.
